import React from 'react' import ReactHtmlParser from "react-html-parser" import {Table, TdLeft, TdRight, PackDiv, Theader, Tbody, Body, Content } from '../PackPromoElement' export default function Category(props) { const { active, cat, index, handleSelection } = props; return ( <> { cat.products.map(item => ( <> Description :{ReactHtmlParser(item.description)}
Prestations :
Contenues{ReactHtmlParser(item.contentPrestation)}
DÃ©lai en semaines : {item.leadTime}
Prix TTC FCFA{item.cfa}
Prix TTC Euros{item.euro}
 )) } ) }
